sentence.orig: A stunning weekend getaway at Phinda Mountain Lodge .

sentence.orig: We arrived late afternoon on Friday , unfortunately we missed the game drive , but were welcomed firstly by the beautiful Nyala buck that live in the trees surrounding the lodge and then by the staff with friendly smiles and warm welcomes , drinks were offered and a spectacular view of the reserve and a tour of the main lodge area .

sentence.orig: We were then ushered to our lodging and oh what wonderful rooms they were .

sentence.orig: Set in the heart of the lodge overlooking the trees our bathroom was all windows with no curtains , the view from the bath was spectacular , the large sliding doors lead out on to the deck with a private , secluded rim flow pool and two very comfy lounges .

sentence.orig: Nothing is too much trouble for the brilliant staff a large number being native to the area , the Zulus love of life is infectious and our ranger Dumi brought a whole new meaning to the word `` safari '' .

sentence.orig: He and his brilliant spotter left no stone unturned in pursuit of the big five , sometimes taking us on hair raising escapades across the very bumpy terrain , stamping on the floor of the jeep to wake a sleeping lion ( not recommended ) , he seemed to get closer to , take more chances and be more tenacious than most of the others ! ! ! !

sentence.orig: He pointed out big five , little five and anything else that moved but the pinnacle of his skill , together with that of his eagle eyed spotter , was when we were coming back in from the evening safari and the torch picked out two eyes in the gloom , leopard , what a fantastic creature , we watched in awe as this beautiful cat walked along the ridge and than crossed over in front of us dumbstruck by it is magnificence .

sentence.orig: The food at the lodge was normally served outside in the boma in the evening and was delicious , the cooks were very proud to come to the table and explain their individual specialities , we tried most things including warthog and kudu , which I must say was very tasty but I did feel somewhat guilty about having been thoroughly amused by the warthogs antics during the day .

sentence.orig: My wife and I just returned from a 15-Day Southern Africa vacation that included 5 nights at Phinda Mountain Lodge .

review.sentence: wife returned 15-day southern africa vacation included 5 night phinda mountain lodge .

sentence.orig: This lodge is run by & Beyond , and is one of several lodges in Phinda Private Game Reserve in the Phinda Resource Reserve in Kwa-Zulu Natal , South Africa .

review.sentence: lodge run & beyond , one several lodge phinda private game reserve phinda resource reserve kwa-zulu natal , south africa .

sentence.orig: We traveled in late July 2012 : this is Winter in South Africa , during the dry season , with mild to cold conditions generally , though the weather was somewhat cooler than normal .

review.sentence: traveled late july 2012 : winter south africa , dry season , mild cold condition generally , though weather somewhat cooler normal .

sentence.orig: This review will cover several areas : ( 1 ) Overall Experience , ( 2 ) Safari Quality , and ( 3 ) Accommodations .

review.sentence: review cover several area : ( 1 ) overall experience , ( 2 ) safari quality , ( 3 ) accommodation .

sentence.orig: Personal Background : my wife and I have been on safaris before in August/September 206 in Kenya , Tanzania , Botswana , and Zambia .

review.sentence: personal background : wife safari august/september 206 kenya , tanzania , botswana , zambia .

sentence.orig: While we normally stay at low to moderately priced lodging , the 206 was at higher end locations ( see Elsas Kopje in Kenya ) .

review.sentence: normally stay low moderately priced lodging , 206 higher end location ( see elsas kopje kenya ) .

sentence.orig: Overall Experience : We had an Excellent experience at Phinda overall .

review.sentence: overall experience : excellent experience phinda overall .

sentence.orig: While the game viewing was not as fantastic as we had hoped , the overall experience was as top-notched as any we have had , including superb guides , fantastic accommodations and meals , and excellent value-for-money .

review.sentence: game viewing fantastic hoped , overall experience top-notched , including superb guide , fantastic accommodation meal , excellent value-for-money .

sentence.orig: As with other safaris , nearly everything is included in the cost ( except some optional activities and higher-end drinks ) .

review.sentence: safari , nearly everything included cost ( except optional activity higher-end drink ) .

sentence.orig: The staff were very friendly and helpful , meeting all our needs with great flexibility and concern for our enjoyment of the vacation .

review.sentence: staff friendly helpful , meeting need great flexibility concern enjoyment vacation .

sentence.orig: We would heartily recommend Phinda to anyone wishing to experience a top-notch safari , particularly to anyone interested in seeing Nyala or Cheetah up-close .

review.sentence: would heartily recommend phinda anyone wishing experience top-notch safari , particularly anyone interested seeing nyala cheetah up-close .

sentence.orig: Daily Safari Quality ( Guide : Nic // Tracker : Malusi ) : ( 1 ) Overall Feel : being at a private reserve , vehicles are allowed to go of-road , which we did numerous times .

sentence.orig: Consequently , you can get much closer to the animals , on a more consistent basis , than you can at the various national parks in South Africa and other countries .

sentence.orig: On one occasion at Phinda , we had Hyenas sniffing our vehicle .

review.sentence: one occasion phinda , hyena sniffing vehicle .

sentence.orig: As we were there in winter , the lack of foliage on the undergrowth helped with the viewing .

review.sentence: winter , lack foliage undergrowth helped viewing .

sentence.orig: However , the undergrowth is dense in many areas and viewing is still much more difficult than in the Serengeti or Chobe .

review.sentence: however , undergrowth dense many area viewing still much difficult serengeti chobe .

sentence.orig: For sheer quantity of game , Phinda is probably not the place to go .

sentence.orig: The only game we saw that was numerous was Nyala , which roam the camp freely .

sentence.orig: Another star of Phinda was black rhino ; on a special black rhino walk we got to within 30m of black We saw very few elephants , no leopard , a smattering of lion , and a few more buffalo .

sentence.orig: We also saw a fair amount of hyena and a scattering of hippos , kudu , wildebeest , waterbuck , and other antelopes .

sentence.orig: I think the first and most important thing that makes this lodge special is the staff .

sentence.orig: From the time Eleonor gave us our very personal welcome through all of Jes delicious meals , on all of our game drives with Ross ( our ranger ) and Saphiwe ( our tracker ) , and during every encounter we had with every member of the staff , we were incredibly impressed with the service , dedication , and enthusiasm of the staff .

sentence.orig: They made us feel like one of the family , and any request we made was treated as no problem .

sentence.orig: Any negatives in the description below are things we did not bring to the attention of the staff or they would have been addressed immediately .

sentence.orig: Safari drives : Understand that Phinda is a relatively small private reserve , so the rangers have a somewhat precise idea of the exact number and probable location of many of the animals .

review.sentence: safari drive : understand phinda relatively small private reserve , ranger somewhat precise idea exact number probable location many animal .

sentence.orig: What this means for the visitor is that you have a significant chance of seeing at least the big 5 , and we saw all of them and more .

review.sentence: mean visitor significant chance seeing least big 5 , saw .

sentence.orig: It also means , however , that the safari experience is a little less `` wild '' than what we found in Kruger , which we understand is even less `` wild '' than the safari experience in other African countries .

review.sentence: also mean , however , safari experience little le `` wild '' found kruger , understand even le `` wild '' safari experience african country .

sentence.orig: That said , we very much enjoyed our game drives and can not imagine how they could have been better at Phinda .

review.sentence: said , much enjoyed game drive imagine could better phinda .

sentence.orig: Having a great ranger and tracker , who are knowledgeable and work well together , makes all the difference , and we could not have been happier with Ross and Saphiwe .

sentence.orig: Our ranger and tracker did an amazing job of finding the animals and giving us the time and information to really observe their natural behaviors .

review.sentence: ranger tracker amazing job finding animal giving u time information really observe natural behavior .

review.sentence: ross saphiwe incredibly knowledgeable enthusiastic , learned great deal enjoyed every minute spent drive .

sentence.orig: The morning mocha-chaca-rules and evening sundowner beers on the game drives are a great touch that we did not find at our other safari lodge and made every day more relaxing and fun .

sentence.orig: Lodge : The lodge and rooms are beautiful and very comfortable .

sentence.orig: Our room was fantastic , with a comfortable bed , large bright bathroom with indoor and outdoor showers , a deck and plunge pool , and excellent and fully included mini-bar .

sentence.orig: The location is amazing with beautiful views and frequent breezes .

sentence.orig: Food and staff : As stated above , the staff is outstanding at every level and could not have made us feel more comfortable .

Food is excellent and plentiful , the Boma dinner spectacular and the Bush meal a very impressive operation , as always we have come back with pounds to shed : - ) The main lodge and the rooms are well appointed , the beds extremely comfortable , but as has been said elsewhere , if you are not particularly fit , the walk to the rooms might be a bit of a challenge .

sentence.orig: We saw lion hunting buffalo and cheetah hunting impala ( the first a dramatic fail , the latter a heart stopping success ) , rhino-both black and white - and a myriad of other amazing wildlife big and small from elephants to dung beetles - even the elusive suni antelope made an appearance .
